name: Ladrillazo
description:
Ladrillazo (brick hit)

Game Jam submission for Indie Spain Jam 2022 (7 day duration).

Barely finished, made by myself, while developing the engine used to build it.
Made using C++, OpenGL, SDL2, Dear ImGui.

🕹️ Please don't press F7 unless you want to see the debug inspector mode that I didn't have time to disable before submitting! 😅
